greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Seventh pi-based arithmetic derivative of n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(k=0, n, d(A(n, k-1))) end:
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 12 2015
